dcterms:description: The Yelp dataset is composed of 359,052 leisure activity entries between October 2004 and January 2015, distributed between 36,885 and 322,167 samples of spam and non-spam content.
dcterms:title: Yelp Dataset

dcterms:description: The MediaWiki dataset contains contributions to travel wikis between August 2003 and June 2020, composed of 319,856 entries, distributed between 24,877 and 249,979 samples of spam and non-spam content.
dcterms:title: MediaWiki Dataset
